access_host_or_ip.name: access_host_or_ip
access_host_or_ip.description: The public IP address or hostname for the access host. The address is used to reach the target or server_host IP address and to configure the DNS, NTP, NFS, and Squid proxy services.

cloud_connection_count.name: cloud_connection_count
cloud_connection_count.description: Required number of Cloud connections to create or reuse. The maximum number of connections is two per location.

cloud_connection_gr.name: cloud_connection_gr
cloud_connection_gr.description: Whether to enable global routing for this IBM Cloud connection. You can specify thia value when you create a connection.

cloud_connection_metered.name: cloud_connection_metered
cloud_connection_metered.description: Whether to enable metering for this IBM Cloud connection. You can specify thia value when you create a connection.

cloud_connection_speed.name: cloud_connection_speed
cloud_connection_speed.description: Speed in megabits per second. Supported values are 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000, 10000. Required when you create a connection.

dns_forwarder_config.name: dns_forwarder_config
dns_forwarder_config.description: Configuration for the DNS forwarder to a DNS service that is not reachable directly from PowerVS.

nfs_config.name: nfs_config
nfs_config.description: Configuration for the shared NFS file system (for example, for the installation media).

ntp_forwarder_config.name: ntp_forwarder_config
ntp_forwarder_config.description: Configuration for the NTP forwarder to an NTP service that is not reachable directly from PowerVS.

perform_proxy_client_setup.name: perform_proxy_client_setup
perform_proxy_client_setup.description: Proxy configuration to allow internet access for a VM or LPAR.

powervs_backup_network.name: powervs_backup_network
powervs_backup_network.description: Name of the IBM Cloud PowerVS backup network and CIDR to create.

powervs_image_names.name: powervs_image_names
powervs_image_names.description: List of Images to be imported into cloud account from catalog images.

powervs_management_network.name: powervs_management_network
powervs_management_network.description: Name of the IBM Cloud PowerVS management subnet and CIDR to create.

powervs_resource_group_name.name: powervs_resource_group_name
powervs_resource_group_name.description: Existing IBM Cloud resource group name.

powervs_service_name.name: powervs_service_name
powervs_service_name.description: Name of the PowerVS service to create.

powervs_sshkey_name.name: powervs_sshkey_name
powervs_sshkey_name.description: Name of the PowerVS SSH key to create.

reuse_cloud_connections.name: reuse_cloud_connections
reuse_cloud_connections.description: When true, IBM Cloud connections are reused (if attached to the transit gateway).

squid_config.name: squid_config
squid_config.description: Configuration for the Squid proxy setup.

ssh_private_key.name: ssh_private_key
ssh_private_key.description: Private SSH key used to login to IBM PowerVS instances. Should match to uploaded public SSH key referenced by 'ssh_public_key'. Entered data must be in heredoc strings format (https://www.terraform.io/language/expressions/strings#heredoc-strings). The key is not uploaded or stored.

ssh_public_key.name: ssh_public_key
ssh_public_key.description: Public SSH Key for the PowerVM to create.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: List of tag names for the IBM Cloud PowerVS service.

transit_gateway_name.name: transit_gateway_name
transit_gateway_name.description: Name of the existing transit gateway. Required when you create new IBM Cloud connections.

access_host_or_ip.name: access_host_or_ip
access_host_or_ip.description: Access host for created PowerVS infrastructure.

cloud_connection_count.name: cloud_connection_count
cloud_connection_count.description: Number of cloud connections configured in created PowerVS infrastructure.

dns_host_or_ip.name: dns_host_or_ip
dns_host_or_ip.description: DNS forwarder host for created PowerVS infrastructure.

nfs_path.name: nfs_path
nfs_path.description: NFS host for created PowerVS infrastructure.

ntp_host_or_ip.name: ntp_host_or_ip
ntp_host_or_ip.description: NTP host for created PowerVS infrastructure.

powervs_backup_network_name.name: powervs_backup_network_name
powervs_backup_network_name.description: Name of backup network in created PowerVS infrastructure.

powervs_management_network_name.name: powervs_management_network_name
powervs_management_network_name.description: Name of management network in created PowerVS infrastructure.

powervs_resource_group_name.name: powervs_resource_group_name
powervs_resource_group_name.description: IBM Cloud resource group where PowerVS infrastructure is created.

powervs_sshkey_name.name: powervs_sshkey_name
powervs_sshkey_name.description: SSH public key name in created PowerVS infrastructure.

powervs_zone.name: powervs_zone
powervs_zone.description: Zone where PowerVS infrastructure is created.

squid_host_or_ip.name: squid_host_or_ip
squid_host_or_ip.description: Proxy host for created PowerVS infrastructure.
